about_the_game:
Be The Bullet Hell, Or Die Trying!

Space Survivors is an action-packed time survival game with roguelite elements, set in the unforgiving depths of space. As a wanted space pirate with a growing bounty on your head, your mission is clear: survive relentless waves of enemies, collect valuable loot, and return to your space station to prepare for even deadlier encounters.

Arm yourself with devastating weapons and upgrades to annihilate enemy fleets and take down powerful bosses. Along the way, you'll gather precious cargo—riches, rare resources, and pets with unique abilities that will aid you in battle. Hack your cargo to unlock these powerful companions, and invest your earnings into permanent upgrades to strengthen your ship for future runs.

The void is ruthless, and every run brings new challenges. Adapt your strategy, master your skills, and see how long you can survive in this high-stakes fight for survival. Are you ready to conquer the chaos of space?

Features

  • Effortless Combat: Automatically fire weapons with an optional manual aiming mode for precise targeting.

  • Quick, Thrilling Runs: Experience fast-paced gameplay in 15-20 minute sessions, perfect for intense bursts of action.

  • Diverse Ships: Choose from 2 unique ships, each with a game-changing ultimate skill—and more ships on the horizon!

  • Dynamic Progression: Collect gold and cargo during runs to unlock permanent upgrades, new ships, and powerful enhancements at your space station.

  • Epic Boss Battles: Face formidable bosses, each with distinct attack patterns, strategies, and rewards.

  • Versatile Turrets and Upgrades: Equip your ship with over 5+ different turrets, each upgradeable for maximum firepower—and more turrets to come!

  • Random Encounters: Discover surprises in every run with random events, from dangerous enemies to unexpected allies.

  • Upgradeable Arsenal: Enhance your ship with powerful weapons and turrets, further improved by synergistic passives.

  • Faithful Companions: Hack cargo to uncover 2 unique pets, each providing valuable buffs or combat abilities—with more companions to come!

  • Expanding Horizons: Explore 2 distinct maps, with additional battlegrounds coming in future updates.

  • Roguelite Adventure: Every run feels fresh with randomized challenges, while permanent upgrades give you the edge needed to survive the escalating chaos.

--------------------------------------- THANK YOU ----------------------------------------

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-6402p or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or newer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or AMD RX 480 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-6402p or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or AMD RX 480 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible device
